snippet: Two passenger jets began to take off at the same time on intersecting runways at Midway International Airport in Chicago, prompting a controller to shout over the radio for one of the pilots to halt to avoid a collision.
lead_paragraph: Two passenger jets began to take off at the same time on intersecting runways at Midway International Airport in Chicago, prompting a controller to shout over the radio for one of the pilots to halt to avoid a collision.

headline.main: Illinois: Planes Halted on Runways to Avoid Collision
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Planes Halted On Runways To Avoid Collision
